room_title: Escape room "Reactor Meltdown" by Harrison Street Escape Room in Bettendorf
review: Very well put together. You can really tell they put a lot of time into this room. Best quality in the Quad Cities! Can't wait for more rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Reactor Meltdown" by Harrison Street Escape Room in Bettendorf
review: Amazingly awesome! We have done several escapes and this is one you won't want to miss. Very inventive, the best setup, creative, and overall great job! I can't wait for the next room.

room_title: Escape room "Reactor Meltdown" by Harrison Street Escape Room in Bettendorf
review: The Harrison Street Escape received rave reviews from our out-of-town guests over Thanksgiving weekend. They had done escape rooms in Chicago and Los Angeles and felt this experience was well worth the visit. My husband and I were "first-timers" and will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Reactor Meltdown" by Harrison Street Escape Room in Bettendorf
review: Incredibly fun! Challenging and exciting. Great time with friends or family!

room_title: Escape room "Reactor Meltdown" by Harrison Street Escape Room in Bettendorf
review: This was our first escape room experience. Harrison Street definitely didn't disappoint! The staff was very friendly and helpful. We came on our 5 yr anniversary to try something new. It showed we could work as a team, do well under pressure and be locked in a room together and survive lol. Seriously though, we look forward to trying other area escape rooms but this one I will be sure to recommend to others!!
